topic.title: Example: Adding a Custom View in

body.p: To add a custom view in , follow this procedure:

ol.li: Locate the plugin.xml descriptor file for your plugin (should be located inside the plugins folder, for example, /plugins/myPlugin). Define the ID of the view you want to add and specify the location where it will be placed:<view id="SampleWorkspaceAccessID" initialSide="WEST" initialRow="0"/>
Define the cmsMessagesArea as a static field (if you can access the messages area from anywhere in your code).
